Blade Flourish: +10' move and flourish during attack 1/tn
Charger: Bonus attack +5 damage or 10' push after Dash
Defensive Flourish: Spend 1 Bardic Inspiration for +d12 damage and AC for 1 tn
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with single, one-hand weapon
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Add ability modifier to second attack damage
Master's Flourish: Use d6 instead of Bardic Inspiration for flourish
Mobile Flourish: Use 1 Bardic Inspiration for +d12 damage and 5'+d12' push
Psychic Blades: Use 1 Bardic Inspiration for +8d6 HP psychic damage 1/tn
Savage Attacker: Re-roll damage 1/tn
Slashing Flourish: Use 1 Bardic Inspiration for +d12 HP damage to target and adjacent foe
Superior Inspiration: Min 1 Bardic Inspiration after initiative

Song Of Rest: Listeners regain 1d12 HP after short rest
Unbreakable Majesty: Foe cannot attack you (DC 16 Cha neg)
